title: Nutanix's Kubernetes Platform: Just Another Single Pane of Glass?
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Nutanix offers a way to significantly simplify and lower the threshold of Kubernetes adoption both from the user and management aspects.
cntitle: Nutanix 的 Kubernetes 平台：仅仅是另一个单一控制面板？
cndescription: Nutanix 提供了一种方法，可以从用户和管理方面显著简化和降低 Kubernetes 采用的门槛。
